feed.title: Workout Tracker Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.11.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove top-level user profile language and totals show from templates by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/59
  • Allow API access via JWT authentication by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/60
  • Add details when editing a workout by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/67
  • Add api endpoints to retrieve statistics, records, etc. by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/62
  • Add GPX details when refreshing a workout by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/69
  • Use the HumanDuration filter to properly print durations by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/70
  • Pre-select the current type when editing a workout by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/71

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.11.2...v0.11.3

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.11.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Create the profile for the initial admin user by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/73
  • Build Docker image for ARM by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/74

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.11.3...v0.11.4

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.11.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove top-level data "currentUser", replace with CurrentUser function by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/76
  • Add per-user setting to disable social sharing buttons by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/77
  • Convert data to functions by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/78

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.11.4...v0.11.5

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.12.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Show dashboard totals from new functions by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/79
  • Switch per-workout records to use the new functions by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/80
  • Convert user statistics to use the new function by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/81
  • Remove redundant workout statistics from workouts handlers and templates by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/82
  • Add per-user units to the user's profile by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/83

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.11.5...v0.12.0

entry.title: New release for Workout Tracker: v0.12.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use preferred units in the workout lap breakdown by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/85
  • Update Human* functions to return values without units by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/86
  • Update statistics in per-workout and past-year to use preferred units by @jovandeginste in https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/pull/87

Full Changelog: https://github.com/jovandeginste/workout-tracker/compare/v0.12.0...v0.12.1
